title: Review MVR for Policy Renewal
description: An underwriter is reviewing an auto policy for renewal and runs a new Motor Vehicle Report (MVR).

tasks.description: Run a new MVR for the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter retrieves the latest driving record.

tasks.description: Analyze the MVR for any new activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter finds a new major violation (e.g., a DUI) on the record.

tasks.description: Apply the appropriate surcharge to the renewal premium based on the new violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter adds a significant surcharge to the policy, increasing the renewal premium.
